sources.title: Stranger With My Face | FULL MOVIE | 2009 | Psychological Thriller, Crime
sources.description:
High school student Laurie Stratton is seeing double when her long-lost identical twin sister, Lia, reappears. She claims to be in the clutches of an abusive foster home and in desperate need of Laurie’s help. Laurie readily agrees but is instead ushered into a terrifying world she never imagined possible—one from which there may be no escape when she discovers Lia’s true nature.

Catherine Hicks, Emily Hirst, Beau Mirchoff, Alexz Johnson, Luisa D’Oliveira, Andrew Francis, Grace Sherman

2009
Directed by Jeff Renfroe

metadata.Plot: After the shocking and untimely death of her husband, Shelley Stratton (Catherine Hicks) moves her daughter Alexis (Emily Hurst) and her adopted daughter, Laurie (Alexz Johnson), to their remote summer house in hopes of giving her family a fresh start. As Laurie begins to settle in and put her life back together, she gets the eerie feeling that she is constantly being watched. Laurie's uneasiness grows when people start claiming to see her in places that she has never been. The family's delicate state begins to unravel when Laurie unearths the dark past, discovering a twin sister that she never knew she had. Laurie is forced to delve deeper into her twin's secrets, for as it turns out her twin has been locked up for years! Laurie must now understand their strange connection in order to prevent her sister from taking over her life and harming her loved ones.
metadata.Writer: Lois Duncan, Jamie Pachino, Eric Tuchman
metadata.Actors: Catherine Hicks, Alexz Johnson, Andrew Francis
